title: A note on Robust Inference from a conditional Poisson Model
abstract: A randomised controlled trial to evaluate a training programme for physician-patient communication required the analysis of paired count data. The impact of departures from the Poisson assumption when paired count data are analysed through use of a conditional likelihood is illustrated. A simple approach to providing robust inference is outlined and illustrated
